title: Alexander the Great
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,415 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 940L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     R and Z2
description: When Alexander the Great died in 323 BCE, his empire stretched from modern-day Greece, through northern Africa and the Middle East, to Asia. The trade and culture he helped spread would change the face of the ancient world.
